SmarthubJa offers a reliable way for you to control your smart home experience with Alexa. Control your light and other devices hands-free. Just say it, SmartHubJA obeys.

Here's the step by step guide:

(1). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or IOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" App.

(2). Go to Skills and game in the Alexa app navigation bar > Go to Search > Search for "SmartHubJA"

(3). Click enable skill of "SmartHubJA", then input your amazon username and password and region on the linking page;

(4). Talk to Echo "Alexa, Discover devices.". Alexa Echo will alert you when device discovery has completed.

(5). All devices setup is now completed, Use echo to now control your discovered devices.


Here are the voice commands SmartHubJA has:

SWITCH

Alexa, turn on switch1


PLUG

Alexa, turn on plug1


Light

Alexa, turn on light1

Alexa, set the light1 to red
